page.title: 05PRIMARY SCHOOL TODAY
page.content: There is one primary school in the village.Everyone seems happy here. We have 6 teachers and a headmaster. The school is busy at all hours, especially now the Tercentenary of The battle of Sedgemoor is coming up. (The last battle on English soil).We have dinner ladies, mums that help work with the children,two cooks and a secretary and three cleaning ladies. The staff meet in the staff room when they are not in class or on playground duty.The top class are given grown up jobs like: crisp selling,washing up ,setting out chairs and tables. It is great fun. We have a playground which is part concrete, part grass.We have made a pond with a rockery around it. Two old buildings in front of the classrooms have been turned into an Exhibition Centre for The Tercentenary.It is{fun}here.
